trans-unit.source: Represents a type that has its lifetime controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: 해당 수명이 워크플로 런타임에 의해 제어되는 형식을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Types derived from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> have their lifetimes controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Handle>에서 파생되는 형식의 수명은 워크플로 런타임에 의해 제어됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For workflow variables of handle types, the runtime uses the required default constructor to create an instance of the type, assigns it to the <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, and calls <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> when initializing the environment.
trans-unit.target: 핸들 형식의 워크플로 변수에 대해서는 런타임이 필수 기본 생성자를 사용하여 형식 인스턴스를 만들고, 해당 인스턴스를 <xref:System.Activities.Variable>에 할당하고, 환경을 초기화할 때 <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A>를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the variable goes out of scope, <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A> is called.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" /> class.
Classes that derive from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> must provide a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Handle>에서 파생되는 클래스는 기본 생성자를 제공해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name to be used by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" /> when added to an activity’s execution properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />이 작업의 실행 속성에 추가되는 경우 사용할 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of derived type as provided by <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" />.
The environment in which the handle is being created.
Called by the workflow runtime when the environment that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />을 포함하는 환경을 초기화할 때 워크플로 런타임에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle was created.
Called by the workflow runtime when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" /> goes out of scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />의 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />이 범위를 벗어날 때 워크플로 런타임에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstance" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />.
The activity instance that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />이 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" />을 포함하는 작업 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Handle" /> has not been initialized.

<xref:System.Activities.Handle.ThrowIfUninitialized%2A> gives custom handle derived class authors a convenient method to call from any methods or properties of the derived class that are not valid if the <xref:System.Activities.Handle> is uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Handle.ThrowIfUninitialized%2A>를 통해 사용자 지정 핸들 파생 클래스 작성자는 <xref:System.Activities.Handle>이 초기화되지 않으면 유효하지 않는 파생 클래스의 메서드 또는 속성에서 간단한 방법으로 호출할 수 있습니다.
